ee.adit.dao.dvk
Class DvkDAO

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.dao.dvk.DvkDAO

public class DvkDAO
extends java.lang.Object

DVK data access class. Provides methods for manipulating data in DVK client database.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee
